body_html: @gunan, I don't feel that the current way of dividing the tests into two files based on test name is very clear. Some test class do not have the name "Checkpoint" in them, but they still use and/or test checkpoints. @sherrym and @concretevitamin may have better input on how best to do the division.

body: @gunan, I don't feel that the current way of dividing the tests into two files based on test name is very clear. Some test class do not have the name "Checkpoint" in them, but they still use and/or test checkpoints. @sherrym and @concretevitamin may have better input on how best to do the division.
